name: .CSB File Extension
summary: Learn about .CSB files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open CSB files and play the music they contain with Goshanes' Street Fighter IV Audio Manager (Windows). If you want to edit a CSB file's contents, you can do so using Sonic Audio Tools (Windows).
You can use Street Fighter IV Audio Manager to convert the audio files that a CSB file contains into .WAV files. You can then play the converted files as you would any WAV file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
